questions.location: Where is the weakness? (arms, legs, face, one side)
questions.onset: When did the weakness start? Was it sudden?
questions.symmetry: Is the weakness on one side or both sides?
questions.sensory_changes: Do you have numbness or tingling?
questions.bowel_bladder: Any loss of bowel or bladder control?

triage_rules.expression: 'sudden' in str(onset).lower() and 'one side' in str(symmetry).lower()
triage_rules.reason: Sudden unilateral weakness - Possible Stroke - Immediate Emergency Care Required
Weakness with bowel/bladder dysfunction - Possible spinal cord compression - Emergency care required
